title: fit and proper
clause_text: fit and proper. However in any condition such PPL shall not be allotted to concerned land owners / housing society / association of apartment owners of occupiers in the plot of PPL.
section: a) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lot (PPL) near Metro Stations

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: fit and proper. However in any condition such PPL shall not be allotted to concerned land owners / housing society / association of apartment owners of occupiers in the plot of PPL.
